title: [Medicine] Immune responses to SARS-CoV-2 decline sharply within eight months of the second jab of the Pfizerâ€“BioNTech or Moderna vaccines, but remain relatively stable after a single shot of the vaccine produced by Johnson & Johnson

[Psychology] Study: People in Europe had the least knowledge of Covid-19 and lowest tendency to care about the coronavirus, while people in the US had the lowest tendency to comply with public health restrictions. As the pandemic began to unfold, people in the Middle East and Asia were the most aware of Covid-19
